name: Kasa Smart Plug Mini 15A, Apple HomeKit Supported, Smart Outlet Works with Siri, Alexa & Google Home, UL Certified, App Control, Scheduling, Timer, 2.4G WiFi Only, 4 Count (Pack of 1) (EP25P4), White
short_description: 【Apple Homekit Support】This Apple HomeKit compatible smart plug fully integrates into your Apple ecosystem, just ask Siri to turn on/off the devices in your home. (Apple HomeKit remote control requires an additional networked Apple device at home such as an iPad, HomePod or Apple TV.)

【Energy Monitoring & 15A Max Load】Use the smart Wi-Fi home plug to monitor your connected device's energy usage in real-time and view its historical power consumption within the Kasa Smart app. 1800W, 15A max load supported.

【Super Easy Setup】Enjoy an extremely easy and quick setup process with this Amazon Frustration-Free Setup (FFS) & Google Seamless Setup (GSS) supported smart plug. You can also setup in a few steps with the Kasa App.

【Compact & Flame Retardant Design】Avoid blocking additional outlets with its compact design, and plug in your WiFi smart plug with confidence thanks to its UL certified flame retardant design and 2-year limited warranty.

【App & Voice Control】Control your WiFi smart plug from anywhere, anytime via the free Kasa App or just give voice commands to Siri, Amazon Alexa, Google Assistant or Samsung SmartThings. Your favorite smart assistant enables you to have a truly hands-free experience. Operating Humidity: 5%~90% RH, Non-condensing
System Requirement: Android 5.0 or higher, iOS 10 or higher
product_description: The EP25 is Kasa’s latest Apple HomeKit supported WiFi mini smart plug that supports 15A maximum load, with Energy Monitoring. You can use it to control lamps, fans, humidifiers, and other home electronic appliances while monitoring each device’s energy consumption. You can also control your plugged-in devices with voice control giving you the option of hands-free convenience. Set schedules, timers, all with the convenience of control from virtually anywhere with your phone. The Kasa app provides a robust suite of features to control your device and enables the plug to work in conjunction with other Kasa Smart devices with smart actions. Installation is a breeze with the simple in app directions and you can connect your smart plug with your home Wi-Fi, Apple HomePod, Amazon Alexa or Google Assistant. EP25 plug supports Amazon Frustration-Free Setup (FFS) & Google Seamless Setup (GSS) for an even simpler setup process.

name: Aqara Zigbee Wireless Mini Switch,Compatible with Apple HomeKit,Google Home,Alexa,Requires Aqara Hub,Versatile 3-Way Control Button for Smart Home Devices,Works with IFTTT
short_description: 【Notes】AN AQARA HUB IS REQUIRED AND SOLD SEPARATELY.(NOTE:Not support hubs from other brands.) Requires a secured 2.4 GHz Wi-Fi network connection for Hub M2/ M1S/ E1/M1S Gen2 and Camera Hub G2H Pro/ G2H, and 2.4/ 5 GHz Wi-Fi for Camera Hub G3/Hub M3. ( Wired connection via Ethernet RJ45 for Hub M3/ Hub M2 is also supported). Additionally, please connect the Aqara Wireless Mini Switch to Aqara hub before connecting to Apple HomeKit or enabling skills in Google Home and Alexa.

【Proximity】For a sturdy connection, ensure that the Aqara Wireless Mini Switch is within 400 inches of the Aqara Zigbee hub, and the hub is within the same range from the Wi-Fi router. Additionally, make sure the hub and the router are on the same local area network (LAN).

【ONE TOUCH CONTROL & 3 CONTROL SETTINGS】A wireless versatile remote to control your smart home devices. Additionally, Set single press, double press, and long press to control programmable functions, such as turning on/off a device, activating a scene, etc.

【EMERGENCY BUTTON】When an emergency occurs in your house, your loved ones can press the button to send an alert notification to your device, or trigger the alarm sound on the Aqara Hub in another room.

【DOORBELL BUTTON】The device can also be used as a doorbell when connected to the Aqara Hub, which offers a selection of different ring tones.Please pull the battery tab out before use. If the device does not work, check to see if the battery is depleted.In addition, Aqara offers 12-months after-sales service. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us.

It allows you to monitor energy consumption and control home appliances, bi-directional motors, electric circuits, and office equipment independently. Additionally, it functions as a Bluetooth gateway, enhancing your smart home connectivity.

Control Two Lights with Shelly 2PM Gen3 - you can control and monitor two lights on the same phase with one device. Track each light's power consumption separately for an efficient setup. Operate it via manual switch, app, home automation system, or voice commands!
Automated Bedroom Curtains - Set Shelly 2PM Gen3 to open your bedroom curtains or shutters at a specific time each morning. Wake up naturally with gradual light, starting your day with ease.

short_description: Shelly Plus Wall Dimmer is a next-generation, Wi-Fi-operated, UL-certified wall dimmer relay switch. It provides dimming and brightening capabilities and can also function as a Wi-Fi repeater and Bluetooth gateway. The device can be used as a standalone unit, an accessory to a home automation controller, or as part of another automation system.

Timer Controller for Maximum Comfort and Intuitive Night Mode - Many kids prefer to fall asleep with the lights turned on. Shelly Plus Wall Dimmer supports auto-on/off timers that allow customers to set the lights to begin dimming on several stages before they switch off completely. Shelly Plus Wall Dimmer supports "Night Mode" allowing you to set a brightness level for your lights after a certain hour.

Sleek Design and Enhanced Security via RPC protocol - With sleek styling and an intuitive touch slider for dimming and brightening, the new Shelly Plus Wall Dimmer US is UL-certified and functions as a standalone device or integrated into virtually any control or automation platform connected directly to Wi-Fi. RPC over MQTT, HTTP, UDP, Receive notification in case someone is trying to dislocate it.!

product_description: Shelly Plus Wall Dimmer - UL Certified, Next-Generation Wi-Fi Wall Dimmer. With sleek styling and an intuitive touch slider for dimming and brightening, the new Shelly Plus Wall Dimmer is UL-certified and functions as a standalone device or integrated into virtually any control or automation platform connected directly to Wi-Fi. Lighting control with UL-certified Wi-Fi Wall Dimmer from Shelly - Introducing the new Shelly Plus Wall Dimmer US - a sleek and UL-certified device that can function as a standalone or integrated into any control platform connected to Wi-Fi. With a simple 4-wire design, quick Bluetooth inclusion, and automatic calibration, it saves integrators time and eliminates complexity in the smart home installation process. Lights that follow any schedule :Set smart scenes based on a particular hour or sunset/sunrise with Shelly Plus Wall Dimmer! That way, they can set the lights in the hallway to switch on and increase the level of brightness as the sunset hour approaches. Smart timers for maximum comfort : Many kids prefer to fall asleep with the lights turned on. Shelly Plus Wall Dimmer supports auto-on/off timers that allow customers to set the lights to begin dimming on several stages before they switch off completely. Intuitive night mode : Shelly Plus Wall Dimmer supports "Night Mode" allowing you to set a brightness level for your lights after a certain hour. That way, you don't have to worry about disturbing the rest of the family when they wake up at night. No lights left switched on : Never worry if you have forgotten a light at home switched on before leaving for work or a family vacation. Shelly Plus Wall Dimmer can be controlled from anywhere around the globe! Shelly Plus Wall Dimmer is adjustable via the app settings to customize the LED light behind the "Power on/off" indicator.

short_description: Make any supported switch “smart” without rewiring — Control rocker switches & one-way buttons from your phone for bedroom lights, fans, or appliances you don’t want to get up to reach — not for toggle/mini switches, touch panels, or stiff/aged buttons.

App control + built-in timers that keep running — Set on/off schedules for morning coffee routines or nightly shutoffs — schedules run in the SwitchBot app without needing your phone nearby or a hub once set.

Bluetooth control included; Hub adds voice + away control — Use Bluetooth for local control, or add a SwitchBot Hub (sold separately) for remote control + voice control (Alexa/Google Assistant/Siri) and IFTTT — 2.4 GHz Wi-Fi required for hub features.

Fast, tool-free install with stronger hold when you prep right — Stick it on in seconds with included adhesive — for best results, mount on clean, dry, smooth surfaces and allow 24 hours for full bonding before heavy use.

Choose the right mode for the job — Use Press Mode for button presses; use Switch Mode for pushing/pulling rocker switches (Switch Mode requires an add-on) — plus scenes and ecosystem automation via the SwitchBot app and API.

name: DC 12V 24V WiFi Smart Switch with DC Output, Compatible with Alexa & Google Home,Smart Life App,for LED Light, Motor, Fan, Lock – DC Input & Output
short_description: DC In & Out - Real Power Output, Not Just Trigger Signal. This smart switch outputs real DC voltage (same as input), allowing direct control of DC8-40V/10A devices such as LED strips, motors, fans, and electronic locks. No extra relay or controller needed.
App & Voice Control - Control the switch anytime via the Smart Life or Tuya app. Supports hands-free voice control through Amazon Alexa and Google Assistant.
Timer, Schedule, and Automation Features - Set custom schedules and timers to automate your lamp opening and closing
Quick Setup - Easy DC Wiring, Simple wiring: Quick install with DC input/output terminals. Compact design, no hub required. Perfect for solar-powered setups, DIY automation, or smart RV systems.

Easy to use - When adding a device, the device is automatically identified, which is very simple and convenient. don't support 5G wifi. Note: Please ensure MAC address filtering is turned off, and try not to use special characters like @ or # in your WiFi name or password.
product_description: This DC 8-40V WiFi smart switch is designed to control and power your low-voltage DC devices with both convenience and flexibility. Unlike many dry-contact or relay-only smart switches, this unit delivers actual DC output voltage—allowing you to directly power LED strip lights, DC motors, electric locks, small fans, and more. Specifications Input Voltage:DC 8-40V Output voltage:DC 8-40V Maximum Current:10 A WiFi: IEEE 802.11b/g/n Radio Frequency:RF433mhz Certification:FCC, CE, RoHS 1. Works with Smart Life and Tuya App Easily turn your devices on/off from anywhere using your smartphone. Create timers, schedules, and scenes to automate your home or RV. 2. Voice Control with Alexa and Google Assistant Use simple voice commands like “Alexa, turn on the fan” or “Hey Google, turn off the light” to control your connected DC devices. 3.Real DC Output Not just a signal trigger. This smart switch provides DC output voltage equal to your input voltage (8-40V), making it ideal for direct use with lighting systems, solar panels, battery-powered devices, RV electronics, access control systems, and more. 4.Easy to Install Simple 2-wire inline connection: DC input and DC output. No neutral wire or additional relay required. Suitable for DIY smart home automation, solar lighting setups, smart RVs, cabinet LED systems, electronic locks, and DC-powered appliances. Perfect for: - DC 8-40V LED strip light control - Smart RV light/fan switch - Solar system automation - Electric door lock controller - 12V/24V battery-powered devices - DIY home automation projects Whether you're upgrading your RV electrical system, automating a DC fan, or creating a solar-powered smart lighting setup, this WiFi+RF smart switch provides powerful, flexible, and smart control—all in one compact unit.

short_description: The Shelly 1 Gen3 is a Wi-Fi-operated smart switch featuring dry contacts and a single 16A channel. It enables remote control of a wide range of home appliances and office equipment while also functioning as a Bluetooth gateway for enhanced connectivity. Designed for seamless retrofitting, its compact size allows it to fit into standard electrical wall boxes, power sockets, light switches, and other tight spaces.

Control Your Garage Door Remotely - Automate your garage door and gain control from anywhere in the world with the Shelly 1 Gen3. Designed to operate at voltages of 12V DC and 24-48V DC, it is perfect for managing garage doors. Additionally, with the Shelly Plus Add-on and a Reed switch, you can monitor the door's current state (open/closed).

Optimal Heating and Cooling - With the Shelly 1 Gen3, you can easily control valves and heating/cooling manifolds for precise temperature regulation and energy efficiency. Pair it with Shelly BLU H&T to automate hot water distribution and switch between heating and cooling modes based on current temperatures. This setup ensures year-round comfort, reduces manual intervention, and allows remote adjustments.

Smart Lighting - Automate your lights to turn on at sunset and off at bedtime, keeping your home perfectly lit while saving energy. With Shelly 1 Gen3’s scheduling features, you can create custom routines and control your lights remotely.

Shelly is one of the fastest-growing Smart Home brands, offering automation solutions for homes, buildings, and businesses. Device include a 3-year warranty and professional support. With the Shelly Smart Control App, you can configure and manage devices remotely, get real-time notifications, and create personalized scenes by combining Shelly devices to trigger automated actions across your smart home.
